original_text: Whose leaves were fair, and the fruit thereof much, and in it was meat for all; under which the beasts of the field dwelt, and upon whose branches the fowls of the heaven had their habitation:
korean_text: 그 잎사귀는 아름답고 그 열매는 많아서 만민의 먹을 것이 될 만하고 들짐승은 그 아래에 살며 공중에 나는 새는 그 가지에 깃들었나이다

sentences.original_text: and in it was meat for all
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에 모든 사람을 위한 먹이가 있었고

sentences.original_text: under which the beasts of the field dwelt
and upon whose branches the fowls of the heaven had their habitation
sentences.korean_translation: 그 가지 위에서 하늘의 새들이 거처를 두었더라
